jPokémon: The Pokémon API

Provides well-documented data structures and utilities for Pokémon games written in Java.
Overview  Package   Class  Use

SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.jpokemon.pmapi.move
Class Move

java.lang.Object
  org.jpokemon.pmapi.move.Move

public class Move
extends Object

Defines a move that can be learned and used by a Pokémon.

Moves that cause status ailments, affect stats, and so on are termed as having a secondary effect.

Since:
Alpha
Author:
Atheriel
